Text: You upload a lot of great stuff bud I think you can better post less but seed longer becauce a lot of your uploads never get completed and that's ashame. Thanks for the effort.

thanks for comments, ya i'm uploading everything again over the next 2wks. I'm going to seed 40-60 uploads(24-48hrs), to allow each release to compile enough seeds.  TPB does not delete posts even after i've hit delete.  what a mess!!! Enjoi the music!!!
